detail_desc: Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in jersey with short sleeves.
Long, straight-cut top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders with two frills, the lower one in satin. Long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft fine knit with a pattern and a ribbed hem.
Wide shirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, long wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and a V-neck with lacing at the front.
Soft toy in soft velour in the shape of a unicorn with a removable dress in tulle and satin. Polyester padding. Length approx. 24 cm.

Set with a pair of trousers and long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton. Trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with a patch pocket on one leg, wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and covered elastication at the hems. Jersey boat-neck top with a button on each shoulder, a ribbed trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Nursing top in lace with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem. Jersey lining.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Wedge-heel sandals with a decorative knot detail at the front, an elasticated strap around the heel and braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 9 cm.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips at the front, an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shirt in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jeans in slightly stretchy denim with a high waist, button fly and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Polo shirt in a textured premium cotton knit with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
Knee-length shorts in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Jumper knitted in a soft, fine modal and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Tops in a lightweight, slub-knit cotton and linen blend with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the hem with a flared flounce.

Shirt woven in a viscose blend with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ties under the chin and earflaps. Jersey lining.
Calf-length skirt in sequin-embroidered chiffon with a concealed zip at the back.
Skirt in an airy, checked viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist.
Sandals with narrow imitation leather straps and thin, decorative metal chains over the foot and ankle. Adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Heel 4.5 cm.
Knee-length dress in softly draping satin with a V-neck and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with bead-embroidered, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the top.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Blouse in a soft weave with a small collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a soft linen and viscose weave with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Size 27x185 cm.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print on one leg, elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Short shorts in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with a sheen. Elasticated waist and short slits in the sides.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Trousers in an airy weave with side pockets, a high waist with elasticated smocking at the back and extra-wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar that has a wrapover front, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in textured jersey with a V-neck and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Skirt with gathered tiers for added width.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and inset side panels with a print.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted jumper in fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell and wool with hole-embroidered sections. Small stand-up collar, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a roll edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.

Knee-length skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and low-cut back with lacing.

Blouse in airy chiffon with glittery spots. Slightly wider neckline with gathers at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Smocking at the front of the hem and a slit and ties at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline with pleats  and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in soft fabric with a round neckline and short sleeves. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Wide trousers in soft twill with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Straight, knee-length dress in a soft knit with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Top in jersey crêpe with short, scallop-edged sleeves and a cut-out pattern and scalloped edge at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a lace yoke.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounced hem with a double flounce at the front. Lined.
Pull-on shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Top in a rustle weave with gathered seams at the front, opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Platform trainers with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
Smocked, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated flounce at the top, short flounced sleeves and a flounced hem.
Bikini briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a chest pocket.

Blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a tie-front collar and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless V-neck dress in a patterned weave with gathers on the shoulders, buttons at the top, a smocked seam under the bust and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a square neckline and long sleeves.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
